game_description: Electronic Universe is a complete electronic musical shooter game. The worlds were designed to fit with the electronic music created specifically for the game. - 3 Levels of difficulty (Easy, Medium, Hard). - 6 Fantasy Musical Worlds. - Shoot the obstacles to keep going on the game levels. - Charge your weapon with ammo that you find over the levels to be stronger. - Use your powers to destroy more obstacles at the same time. - Enjoy electronic music and rythmic decorations of the game.
review_1: Horribly executed. Uninstalled immediately as some of the enemies (they're not all laser emitters) look almost invisible and a single hit from anything kills you, forcing you to restart an entire level. Why they didn't put in multiple lives, or give you more reaction time to see enemies to actually enjoy the scenery is beyond me. Some enemies spawn, or are intentionally positioned against you, with less than 2 seconds to shoot them when you're already busy trying to take down others. Wait for significant updates before trying this one.
